content.question: ​The polynomial function <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals x cubed minus 10 x squared minus 4"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math>. choices.label: ​The output values sometimes increase without bound and sometimes decrease without bound.
